page.title: 01WILLAND VILLAGE DEVON 1985
page.content: {WILLAND }IS A GROWING VILLAGE IN THE COUNTY OF DEVON PRESENT POPULATION ABOUT 1500 AND ON AN AREA OF 1010 ACRES. IT IS A CIVIL PARISH IN THE MID_DEVON DISTRICT AND THE TIVERTON CONSTITUENCY. TELEPHONE EXCHANGE TIVERTON. THE VILLAGE IS SERVED BY THE B3181 (FORMERLY A30 TRUNK ROAD) AND IS 3 MILES FROM THE JUNCTION OF THE{M5}(WHICH RUNS TO ONE SIDE OF THE VILLAGE).{TIVERTON JUNCTION }RAILWAY STATION IS IN THE PARISH AND IS ON THE MAIN LINE TO THE NORTH AND LONDON PADDINGTON.(SEE PAGE ON WILLAND RAIL) WILLAND HAS A BUS SERVICE TO THE LOCAL TOWNS OF CULLOMPTON AND TIVERTON. THERE ARE TWO {CHURCHES }IN WILLAND THE PARISH CHURCH OF ST MARY THE VIRGIN AND THE METHODIST CHURCH. WILLAND HAS A PRIMARY{SCHOOL.}CHILDREN GO ON TO CULLOMPTON OR UFFCULME SCHOOL FOR SECONDARY EDUCATION.
